title: Drawing, "River with Boats and Rafts", August 28, 1879
signed: Dated in graphite ?, above right: Aug. 28, 79.
inscribed:
Recto: Inscribed in graphite ?, upper right: Tetons from plains ... ; and twice: clouds ; and color notations.
Verso: Inscribed in ?: [N]o. 1.
description:
Recto: Horizontal view of Teton range seen from the plain.
Verso in opposite direction: Moutainous country with a bridge crossing the river in the backgournd and a town lying on left bank.
